results.snippet: So you've lost your job, and you've applied for weekly unemployment benefits. Assuming the reasons you present for your jobless state are deemed officially reasonable, you can look forward to that weekly check -- unless, that is, your former employer...
results.lead_paragraph: So you've lost your job, and you've applied for weekly unemployment benefits. Assuming the reasons you present for your jobless state are deemed officially reasonable, you can look forward to that weekly check -- unless, that is, your former employer appeals the decision and claims that you really quit without cause or were fired for cause.

headline.main: Cape Kennedy Recalls 10 Years in Space

results.snippet: CAPE KENNEDY, Fla., May 5 -- In the mircrosecond, escape-velocity world of the space age, it can take only a decade for nostalgia to set in. And it focused here today on Launching Pad 5, the site from which the first American was launched into space...

byline.original: By JOHN NOBLE WILFORDSpecial to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: CAPE KENNEDY, Fla., May 5 -- In the mircrosecond, escape-velocity world of the space age, it can take only a decade for nostalgia to set in. And it focused here today on Launching Pad 5, the site from which the first American was launched into space on May 5, 1961.

results.lead_paragraph: " WE have talent in abundance in this country. It remains only for those of us interested in the fine arts to uncover and promote it," said Mrs. Elvira Clain-Stefanelli in her address before 150 members and guests of the newly formed Collectors of Art Medals, Inc., at the New York Hilton.

results.snippet: First came the chimes, then the voice, calmly but cryptically promising great truths. Mystical experiences don't happen often in public schools, otherwise Class 4-4 might fairly have expected something in that line.

headline.main: Crash at Start: 20 Injured; Pace-Car Crash at Start of Race Injures 20

results.snippet: INDIANAPOLIS, May 29 -- A missing flagpole was the reason for the accident at the start of the 500-mile race today, according to the driver of the pace car, a local Dodge dealer.

byline.original: By GEORGE VECSEYSpecial to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS, May 29 -- A missing flagpole was the reason for the accident at the start of the 500-mile race today, according to the driver of the pace car, a local Dodge dealer.
